text: A Dog of Flanders is a 1959 movie directed by James B. Clark. It stars David Ladd, Donald Crisp, and Theodore Bikel. It is based on a book by Ouida. It is about a grandfather and his grandson who rescue a dog from abuse. The grandson wants to become a painter. == Other websites == * Category:1959 movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies based on books Category:1950s English-language movies
title: A Dog of Flanders (1959 movie)
